Application.SQL: SELECT a.APP_ID,a.APP_NUMBER, a.APP_VERSION_ID,a.APP_VERSION, convert(varchar,a.APP_ID)+'~'+convert(varchar,a.APP_VERSION_ID)+'~'+convert(varchar,a.APP_NUMBER) as APP_NUMBER_ID, convert(varchar,a.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(IsNull(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + IsNull(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + IsNull(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) +'~'+ convert(varchar,isnull(a.POLICY_ID,''))+'~'+convert(varchar,isnull(a.POLICY_VERSION_ID,''))+'~'+isnull(a.POLICY_NUMBER,'') + '~' + convert(varchar,isnull(QQ.QQ_ID,'')) + '~' + isnull(QQ.QQ_NUMBER,'') AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST a WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.CUSTOMER_ID = b.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_QUICKQUOTE_LIST QQ WITH(NOLOCK) on a.APP_ID = QQ.APP_ID AND a.APP_VERSION_ID = QQ.APP_VERSION_ID AND a.CUSTOMER_ID = QQ.CUSTOMER_ID

ApplicationCustInfo.SQL: SELECT A.APP_ID,A.APP_NUMBER,A.APP_NUMBER AS APP_NUMBER_ID, A.APP_VERSION_ID,A.APP_VERSION,ISNULL(a.POLICY_NUMBER,'') AS POLICY_NUMBER, ISNULL(D.QQ_NUMBER,'') AS QQ_NUMBER, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.APP_ID)+'~'+CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.APP_VERSION_ID) +'~'+CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.APP_NUMBER)+'~'+ CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') + '~' + CAST(ISNULL(a.POLICY_ID,'') AS VARCHAR) + '~' + CAST(ISNULL(a.POLICY_VERSION_ID,'') AS VARCHAR) + '~' + + CAST(ISNULL(a.POLICY_NUMBER,'') AS VARCHAR) + '~' + CAST(ISNULL(d.QQ_ID,'') AS VARCHAR) + '~' + CAST(ISNULL(d.qq_number,'') AS VARCHAR) ) AS APP_CUSTOMER_ID_NAME FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST B WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.CUSTOMER_ID = A.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_QUICKQUOTE_LIST d WITH(NOLOCK) on A.CUSTOMER_ID = d.CUSTOMER_ID AND A.APP_VERSION_ID=d.APP_VERSION_ID AND d.APP_ID = A.APP_ID WHERE a.CUSTOMER_ID =@CUSTID

ApplicationCustInfoAll.SQL: SELECT A.APP_ID,A.APP_NUMBER,A.APP_NUMBER AS APP_NUMBER_ID, A.APP_VERSION_ID,A.APP_VERSION,ISNULL(a.POLICY_NUMBER,'') AS POLICY_NUMBER, ISNULL(D.QQ_NUMBER,'') AS QQ_NUMBER, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.APP_ID)+'~'+CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.APP_VERSION_ID) +'~'+CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.APP_NUMBER)+'~'+ CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') + '~' + CAST(ISNULL(a.POLICY_ID,'') AS VARCHAR) + '~' + CAST(ISNULL(a.POLICY_VERSION_ID,'') AS VARCHAR) + '~' + + CAST(ISNULL(a.POLICY_NUMBER,'') AS VARCHAR) + '~' + CAST(ISNULL(d.QQ_ID,'') AS VARCHAR) + '~' + CAST(ISNULL(d.qq_number,'') AS VARCHAR) ) AS APP_CUSTOMER_ID_NAME FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST B WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.CUSTOMER_ID = A.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_QUICKQUOTE_LIST d WITH(NOLOCK) on A.CUSTOMER_ID = d.CUSTOMER_ID AND A.APP_VERSION_ID=d.APP_VERSION_ID AND d.APP_ID = A.APP_ID WHERE APP_STATUS!='QAPP'

ApplicationCustomer.SQL: SELECT APP_ID,APP_NUMBER, APP_VERSION_ID,APP_VERSION, convert(varchar,a.APP_ID)+'~'+convert(varchar,a.APP_VERSION_ID)+'~'+convert(varchar,a.APP_NUMBER)+'~'+ convert(varchar,a.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) as APP_CUSTOMER_ID_NAME, convert(varchar,a.APP_ID)+'~'+convert(varchar,a.APP_VERSION_ID)+'~'+convert(varchar,a.APP_NUMBER) as APP_NUMBER_ID, convert(varchar,a.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST b WITH(NOLOCK) on b.CUSTOMER_ID = a.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE b.CUSTOMER_ID = @CUSTID

CoApplicantCustomer.SQL: SELECT CAL.FIRST_NAME,CAL.LAST_NAME,CAL.APPLICANT_ID AS CO_APPLICANT_ID,convert(varchar,APPLICANT_ID) + '~'+ RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(CAL.FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CAL.MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(CAL.LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME FROM CLT_APPLICANT_LIST CAL WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CAL.CUSTOMER_ID = @CUSTID

CoApplicantApplication.SQL: SELECT CAL.FIRST_NAME,CAL.LAST_NAME,CAL.APPLICANT_ID AS CO_APPLICANT_ID, CONVERT(VARCHAR,CAL.APPLICANT_ID) + '~'+ RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(CAL.FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CAL.MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(CAL.LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME FROM CLT_APPLICANT_LIST CAL WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN POL_APPLICANT_LIST AAL WITH(NOLOCK) ON AAL.CUSTOMER_ID=CAL.CUSTOMER_ID AND AAL.APPLICANT_ID=CAL.APPLICANT_ID WHERE AAL.CUSTOMER_ID=@CUSTID AND AAL.POLICY_ID=@APP_ID AND AAL.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@APP_VERSION_ID

CoApplicantPolicy.SQL: SELECT CAL.FIRST_NAME,CAL.LAST_NAME,CAL.APPLICANT_ID AS CO_APPLICANT_ID, CONVERT(VARCHAR,CAL.APPLICANT_ID) + '~'+ RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(CAL.FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CAL.MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(CAL.LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME FROM CLT_APPLICANT_LIST CAL WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN POL_APPLICANT_LIST PAL WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAL.CUSTOMER_ID=CAL.CUSTOMER_ID AND PAL.APPLICANT_ID=CAL.APPLICANT_ID WHERE PAL.CUSTOMER_ID=@CUSTID AND PAL.POLICY_ID=@POLICY_ID AND PAL.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@POLICY_VERSION_ID

CoApplicant.SQL: SELECT CAL.FIRST_NAME,CAL.LAST_NAME,CAL.APPLICANT_ID AS CO_APPLICANT_ID,convert(varchar,APPLICANT_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(CAL.FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CAL.MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(CAL.LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME FROM CLT_APPLICANT_LIST CAL WITH(NOLOCK)

DBPolicy.SQL: SELECT A.POLICY_ID,A.POLICY_VERSION_ID,A.POLICY_NUMBER,A.POLICY_DISP_VERSION, CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(A.POLICY_ID,''))+'~'+CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(A.POLICY_VERSION_ID,''))+'~'+ ISNULL(A.POLICY_NUMBER,'') + '~' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(A.APP_ID,'')) + '~'+CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(A.APP_VERSION_ID,'')) + '~' + ISNULL(A.APP_NUMBER,'') + '~' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(A.CUSTOMER_ID,'')) AS POLICY_APP_NUMBER, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME , ISNULL(CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') AS NAME FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.CUSTOMER_ID = B.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE ISNULL(A.BILL_TYPE,'') = 'DB' AND A.POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT MAX(POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID) FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN POL_POLICY_PROCESS PPP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PPP.CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND PPP.POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID AND PPP.NEW_POLICY_VERSION_ID = POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID WHERE POL.CUSTOMER_ID = A.CUSTOMER_ID AND POL.POLICY_ID = A.POLICY_ID AND POL.POLICY_NUMBER=A.POLICY_NUMBER AND BILL_TYPE='DB' AND ( (ISNULL(PPP.PROCESS_STATUS,'') = 'COMPLETE' AND ISNULL(PPP.REVERT_BACK,'N') = 'N' ) OR POL.POLICY_STATUS IN ( 'SUSPENDED','UISSUE','URENEW') ) )

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

Policy.SQL: SELECT a.POLICY_ID,a.POLICY_VERSION_ID,a.POLICY_NUMBER,a.POLICY_DISP_VERSION, convert(varchar,a.POLICY_ID)+'~'+convert(varchar,a.POLICY_VERSION_ID)+'~'+a.POLICY_NUMBER + '~' + convert(varchar,a.APP_ID) + '~'+convert(varchar,a.APP_VERSION_ID) + '~' + isnull(a.APP_NUMBER,'') + '~' + a.POLICY_LOB AS POLICY_APP_NUMBER, convert(varchar,a.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.CUSTOMER_ID = b.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE A.POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 POLICY_VERSION_ID FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = A.CUSTOMER_ID AND POLICY_ID = A.POLICY_ID ORDER BY POLICY_VERSION_ID DESC)

Quote.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT A.QQ_ID AS QQ_ID,A.QQ_NUMBER AS QQ_NUMBER, CONVERT(VARCHAR,isnull(A.QQ_ID,'')) + '~' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,isnull(A.QQ_NUMBER,'')) + '~' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(D.POLICY_ID,''))+'~'+CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(D.POLICY_VERSION_ID,''))+'~'+ISNULL(D.POLICY_NUMBER,'') + '~' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,isnull(d.APP_ID,'')) + '~'+CONVERT(VARCHAR,isnull(d.APP_VERSION_ID,'')) + '~' + isnull(d.APP_NUMBER,'') + '~' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,isnull(B.CUSTOMER_ID,'')) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS POLICY_APP_CUSTOMER_ID_NAME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.QQ_ID)+'~'+CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.QQ_NUMBER) AS QQ_APP_NUMBER, RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_NAME FROM CLT_QUICKQUOTE_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.CUSTOMER_ID = B.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST D WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.CUSTOMER_ID = D.CUSTOMER_ID AND a.APP_ID = D.APP_ID AND a.APP_VERSION_ID = D.APP_VERSION_ID WHERE A.IS_ACTIVE='Y' AND B.IS_ACTIVE='Y' AND D.IS_ACTIVE='Y' AND D.POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 POLICY_VERSION_ID FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = D.CUSTOMER_ID AND POLICY_ID = D.POLICY_ID ORDER BY POLICY_VERSION_ID DESC)

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(B.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

QuoteCust.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT A.QQ_ID AS QQ_ID,A.QQ_NUMBER AS QQ_NUMBER, CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(A.QQ_ID,'')) + '~' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(A.QQ_NUMBER,'')) + '~' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(D.POLICY_ID,''))+ '~' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(D.POLICY_VERSION_ID,''))+ '~' + ISNULL(D.POLICY_NUMBER,'') + '~' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(d.APP_ID,'')) + '~' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(d.APP_VERSION_ID,'')) + '~' + ISNULL(d.APP_NUMBER,'') + '~' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_ID,'')) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS POLICY_APP_CUSTOMER_ID_NAME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.QQ_ID)+'~'+CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.QQ_NUMBER) AS QQ_APP_NUMBER, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME FROM CLT_QUICKQUOTE_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.CUSTOMER_ID = B.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST D WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.CUSTOMER_ID = D.CUSTOMER_ID AND D.POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 POLICY_VERSION_ID FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = d.CUSTOMER_ID AND POLICY_ID = d.POLICY_ID ORDER BY POLICY_VERSION_ID DESC) WHERE A.IS_ACTIVE='Y' AND A.CUSTOMER_ID=@CUSTID

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(B.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

PolicyCustInfo.SQL: SELECT a.POLICY_ID,a.POLICY_VERSION_ID,a.POLICY_NUMBER AS POLICY_NUMBER,a.POLICY_DISP_VERSION, convert(varchar,isnull(a.POLICY_ID,''))+'~'+convert(varchar,isnull(a.POLICY_VERSION_ID,''))+'~'+ISNULL(a.POLICY_NUMBER,'') + '~' + convert(varchar,isnull(a.APP_ID,'')) + '~'+convert(varchar,isnull(a.APP_VERSION_ID,'')) + '~' + convert(varchar,isnull(a.APP_NUMBER,'')) + '~' + convert(varchar,isnull(a.CUSTOMER_ID,'')) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,''))) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')+ '~' +convert(varchar,isnull(QQ.QQ_ID,'')) + '~' +ISNULL(QQ.QQ_NUMBER,'') AS POLICY_APP_CUSTOMER_ID_NAME, mlm.LOB_DESC,STATUS_MASTER.POLICY_DESCRIPTION as APP_STATUS, convert(varchar(20), a.APP_EFFECTIVE_DATE, 101) + '-' + convert(varchar(20), a.APP_EXPIRATION_DATE, 101) POLICY_TERM, convert(varchar,a.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME, RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) CUSTOMER_NAME FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.CUSTOMER_ID = b.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_QUICKQUOTE_LIST QQ WITH(NOLOCK) on a.APP_ID = QQ.APP_ID AND a.APP_VERSION_ID = QQ.APP_VERSION_ID AND a.CUSTOMER_ID = QQ.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN POL_POLICY_STATUS_MASTER AS STATUS_MASTER with(nolock) ON STATUS_MASTER.POLICY_STATUS_CODE = a.POLICY_STATUS LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER mlm WITH(NOLOCK) on mlm.lob_id = cast(a.policy_lob as smallint) WHERE UPPER(POLICY_STATUS)!='APPLICATION'

PolicyCustomer.SQL: SELECT a.POLICY_ID,a.POLICY_VERSION_ID,a.POLICY_NUMBER AS POLICY_NUMBER,a.POLICY_DISP_VERSION, convert(varchar,isnull(a.POLICY_ID,''))+'~'+convert(varchar,isnull(a.POLICY_VERSION_ID,''))+'~'+ISNULL(a.POLICY_NUMBER,'') + '~' + convert(varchar,isnull(a.APP_ID,'')) + '~'+convert(varchar,isnull(a.APP_VERSION_ID,'')) + '~' + convert(varchar,isnull(a.APP_NUMBER,'')) + '~' + convert(varchar,isnull(a.CUSTOMER_ID,'')) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,''))) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')+ '~' +convert(varchar,isnull(QQ.QQ_ID,'')) + '~' +ISNULL(QQ.QQ_NUMBER,'') AS POLICY_APP_CUSTOMER_ID_NAME, mlm.LOB_DESC, STATUS_MASTER.POLICY_DESCRIPTION AS APP_STATUS, convert(varchar(20), a.APP_EFFECTIVE_DATE, 101) + '-' + convert(varchar(20), a.APP_EXPIRATION_DATE, 101) POLICY_TERM, convert(varchar,a.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME, RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) CUSTOMER_NAME FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.CUSTOMER_ID = b.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_QUICKQUOTE_LIST QQ WITH(NOLOCK) on a.APP_ID = QQ.APP_ID AND a.APP_VERSION_ID = QQ.APP_VERSION_ID AND a.CUSTOMER_ID = QQ.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN POL_POLICY_STATUS_MASTER AS STATUS_MASTER WITH(NOLOCK) ON STATUS_MASTER.POLICY_STATUS_CODE=a.POLICY_STATUS LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER mlm WITH(NOLOCK) on mlm.lob_id = a.POLICY_LOB where a.CUSTOMER_ID = @customerID1 AND POLICY_STATUS!='APPLICATION' AND POLICY_NUMBER!='' and A.POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 POLICY_VERSION_ID FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = A.CUSTOMER_ID AND POLICY_ID = A.POLICY_ID ORDER BY POLICY_VERSION_ID DESC)

ClaimPolicyCustomer.SQL: SELECT CCI.CLAIM_ID, CCI.CLAIM_NUMBER AS CLAIM_NUMBER, CCI.POLICY_ID, PCPL.POLICY_NUMBER AS POLICY_NUMBER, CONVERT(VARCHAR,CCI.CLAIM_ID)+'~'+CCI.CLAIM_NUMBER+'~'+ CONVERT(VARCHAR,CCI.POLICY_ID)+'~'+PCPL.POLICY_NUMBER+'~'+ CONVERT(VARCHAR,CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID) AS CLAIM_POLICY_NUMBER, CONVERT(VARCHAR,CCI.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+ RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + CASE ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') WHEN ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') THEN '' ELSE CCL.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME END + ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,''))) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME FROM CLM_CLAIM_INFO CCI WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST PCPL WITH(NOLOCK) ON CCI.CUSTOMER_ID = PCPL.CUSTOMER_ID AND CCI.POLICY_ID = PCPL.POLICY_ID AND CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PCPL.POLICY_VERSION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CCL WITH(NOLOCK) ON CCI.CUSTOMER_ID = CCL.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE CCI.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND CCI.CUSTOMER_ID = @customerID2

ClaimCustomer.SQL: SELECT CCI.CLAIM_ID, CCI.CLAIM_NUMBER AS CLAIM_NUMBER,PCPL.POLICY_NUMBER AS POLICY_NUMBER from CLM_CLAIM_INFO CCI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CLT WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLT.CUSTOMER_ID=CCI.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST PCPL WITH(NOLOCK) ON CCI.CUSTOMER_ID = PCPL.CUSTOMER_ID AND CCI.POLICY_ID = PCPL.POLICY_ID AND CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PCPL.POLICY_VERSION_ID INNER JOIN MNT_AGENCY_LIST AGN WITH(NOLOCK) ON AGN.AGENCY_ID = CLT.CUSTOMER_AGENCY_ID

ClaimCustomer4Agency.SQL: SELECT CCI.CLAIM_ID, CCI.CLAIM_NUMBER AS CLAIM_NUMBER,PCPL.POLICY_NUMBER AS POLICY_NUMBER from CLM_CLAIM_INFO CCI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CLT WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLT.CUSTOMER_ID=CCI.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST PCPL WITH(NOLOCK) ON CCI.CUSTOMER_ID = PCPL.CUSTOMER_ID AND CCI.POLICY_ID = PCPL.POLICY_ID AND CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PCPL.POLICY_VERSION_ID INNER JOIN MNT_AGENCY_LIST AGN WITH(NOLOCK) ON AGN.AGENCY_ID = PCPL.AGENCY_ID INNER JOIN CLM_PARTIES CP WITH(NOLOCK) ON CP.CLAIM_ID = CCI.CLAIM_ID WHERE AGN.AGENCY_ID='@AGENCY_ID' AND CP.NAME LIKE '%@NAME%'

ClaimCustomer4AgencyWAgency.SQL: SELECT CCI.CLAIM_ID, CCI.CLAIM_NUMBER AS CLAIM_NUMBER,PCPL.POLICY_NUMBER AS POLICY_NUMBER from CLM_CLAIM_INFO CCI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CLT WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLT.CUSTOMER_ID=CCI.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST PCPL WITH(NOLOCK) ON CCI.CUSTOMER_ID = PCPL.CUSTOMER_ID AND CCI.POLICY_ID = PCPL.POLICY_ID AND CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PCPL.POLICY_VERSION_ID INNER JOIN MNT_AGENCY_LIST AGN WITH(NOLOCK) ON AGN.AGENCY_ID = PCPL.AGENCY_ID INNER JOIN CLM_PARTIES CP WITH(NOLOCK) ON CP.CLAIM_ID = CCI.CLAIM_ID WHERE CP.NAME LIKE '%@NAME%'

ClaimPolicy.SQL: SELECT distinct POLICY_NUMBER,POLICY_DISP_VERSION,LOB_DESC, convert(varchar(10),POL.POLICY_ID)+'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.CUSTOMER_ID) +'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),POL.POLICY_NUMBER)+'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID) AS POL_INFORM,POLICY_LOB, ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') +' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') AS CUSTOMER_NAME ,POL.BILL_TYPE FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.POLICY_LOB = MNT.LOB_ID INNER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CLT WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLT.CUSTOMER_ID=POL.CUSTOMER_ID INNER JOIN MNT_AGENCY_LIST AGN WITH(NOLOCK) ON AGN.AGENCY_ID = POL.AGENCY_ID INNER JOIN CLM_CLAIM_INFO CCI WITH(NOLOCK) ON CCI.CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND CCI.POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID AND CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID INNER JOIN CLM_PARTIES CP WITH(NOLOCK) ON CP.CLAIM_ID = CCI.CLAIM_ID WHERE AGN.AGENCY_ID='@AGENCY_ID' AND CP.NAME LIKE '%@NAME%'

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

ClaimPolicyclaimWAgency.SQL: SELECT distinct POLICY_NUMBER,POLICY_DISP_VERSION,LOB_DESC, convert(varchar(10),POL.POLICY_ID)+'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.CUSTOMER_ID) +'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),POL.POLICY_NUMBER)+'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID) AS POL_INFORM,POLICY_LOB, ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') +' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') AS CUSTOMER_NAME ,POL.BILL_TYPE FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.POLICY_LOB = MNT.LOB_ID INNER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CLT WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLT.CUSTOMER_ID=POL.CUSTOMER_ID INNER JOIN MNT_AGENCY_LIST AGN WITH(NOLOCK) ON AGN.AGENCY_ID = POL.AGENCY_ID INNER JOIN CLM_CLAIM_INFO CCI WITH(NOLOCK) ON CCI.CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND CCI.POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID AND CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID INNER JOIN CLM_PARTIES CP WITH(NOLOCK) ON CP.CLAIM_ID = CCI.CLAIM_ID WHERE CP.NAME LIKE '%@NAME%' and CCI.CLAIM_ID='@CLAIM'

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

PolicyCustomerApplication.SQL: SELECT a.POLICY_ID,a.POLICY_VERSION_ID,a.POLICY_NUMBER AS POLICY_NUMBER,a.POLICY_DISP_VERSION, convert(varchar,isnull(a.POLICY_ID,''))+'~'+convert(varchar,isnull(a.POLICY_VERSION_ID,''))+'~'+ISNULL(a.POLICY_NUMBER,'') + '~' + convert(varchar,isnull(a.APP_ID,'')) + '~'+convert(varchar,isnull(a.APP_VERSION_ID,'')) + '~' + convert(varchar,isnull(a.APP_NUMBER,'')) + '~' + convert(varchar,isnull(a.CUSTOMER_ID,'')) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,''))) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')+ '~' +convert(varchar,isnull(QQ.QQ_ID,'')) + '~' +ISNULL(QQ.QQ_NUMBER,'') AS POLICY_APP_CUSTOMER_ID_NAME, mlm.LOB_DESC, a.APP_STATUS, convert(varchar(20), a.APP_EFFECTIVE_DATE, 101) + '-' + convert(varchar(20), a.APP_EXPIRATION_DATE, 101) POLICY_TERM, convert(varchar,a.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME, RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) CUSTOMER_NAME FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.CUSTOMER_ID = b.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_QUICKQUOTE_LIST QQ WITH(NOLOCK) on a.APP_ID = QQ.APP_ID AND a.APP_VERSION_ID = QQ.APP_VERSION_ID AND a.CUSTOMER_ID = QQ.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER mlm WITH(NOLOCK) on mlm.lob_id = a.POLICY_LOB where a.CUSTOMER_ID = @customerID2 and a.APP_ID = @APPID and a.APP_VERSION_ID = @APPVERSION and A.POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 POLICY_VERSION_ID FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = A.CUSTOMER_ID AND POLICY_ID = A.POLICY_ID ORDER BY POLICY_VERSION_ID DESC)

HolderCustomerPolicyForAUTOMOTOR.SQL: SELECT isnull(MNT.HOLDER_NAME,'') as HOLDER_NAME,isnull(MNT.HOLDER_STATE,'') as HOLDER_STATE,H.HOLDER_ID as HOLDER_ID,CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(H.HOLDER_ID,'')) + '~' + RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(MNT.HOLDER_NAME,''))) AS HOLDER_ID_NAME FROM POL_ADD_OTHER_INT H WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON MNT.HOLDER_ID = H.HOLDER_ID WHERE H.CUSTOMER_ID = @CUSTOMERID3 AND H.POLICY_ID = @POLID3 AND H.POLICY_VERSION_ID = @POLVERSION3

HolderCustomerPolicyForHOMERENTAL.SQL: SELECT ISNULL(MNT.HOLDER_NAME,'') AS HOLDER_NAME,ISNULL(MNT.HOLDER_STATE,'') AS HOLDER_STATE,H.HOLDER_ID AS HOLDER_ID,CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(H.HOLDER_ID,'')) + '~' + RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(MNT.HOLDER_NAME,''))) AS HOLDER_ID_NAME FROM POL_HOME_OWNER_ADD_INT H WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON MNT.HOLDER_ID = H.HOLDER_ID WHERE H.CUSTOMER_ID = @CUSTOMERID3 AND H.POLICY_ID = @POLID3 AND H.POLICY_VERSION_ID = @POLVERSION3 UNION SELECT ISNULL(MNT.HOLDER_NAME,'') AS HOLDER_NAME, ISNULL(MNT.HOLDER_STATE,'') AS HOLDER_STATE, H.HOLDER_ID AS HOLDER_ID, CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(H.HOLDER_ID,'')) + '~' + RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(MNT.HOLDER_NAME,''))) AS HOLDER_ID_NAME FROM POL_WATERCRAFT_COV_ADD_INT H WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON MNT.HOLDER_ID = H.HOLDER_ID WHERE H.CUSTOMER_ID = @CUSTOMERID3 AND H.POLICY_ID = @POLID3 AND H.POLICY_VERSION_ID = @POLVERSION3

HolderCustomerPolicyForBOAT.SQL: SELECT isnull(MNT.HOLDER_NAME,'') as HOLDER_NAME,isnull(MNT.HOLDER_STATE,'') as HOLDER_STATE,H.HOLDER_ID as HOLDER_ID,CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(H.HOLDER_ID,'')) + '~' + RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(MNT.HOLDER_NAME,''))) AS HOLDER_ID_NAME FROM POL_WATERCRAFT_COV_ADD_INT H WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON MNT.HOLDER_ID = H.HOLDER_ID WHERE H.CUSTOMER_ID = @CUSTOMERID3 AND H.POLICY_ID = @POLID3 AND H.POLICY_VERSION_ID = @POLVERSION3

HolderCustomerPolicyForGENERAL.SQL: SELECT isnull(MNT.HOLDER_NAME,'') as HOLDER_NAME,isnull(MNT.HOLDER_STATE,'') as HOLDER_STATE,H.HOLDER_ID as HOLDER_ID,CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(H.HOLDER_ID,'')) + '~' + RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(MNT.HOLDER_NAME,''))) AS HOLDER_ID_NAME FROM POL_GENERAL_HOLDER_INTEREST H WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON MNT.HOLDER_ID = H.HOLDER_ID WHERE H.CUSTOMER_ID = @CUSTOMERID3 AND H.POLICY_ID = @POLID3 AND H.POLICY_VERSION_ID = @POLVERSION3

PolicyCustomerAgency.SQL: SELECT A.POLICY_ID,A.POLICY_VERSION_ID,A.POLICY_NUMBER,A.POLICY_DISP_VERSION, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.POLICY_ID)+'~'+CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.POLICY_VERSION_ID)+'~'+A.POLICY_NUMBER + '~' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.APP_ID) + '~'+CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.APP_VERSION_ID) + '~' + ISNULL(a.APP_NUMBER,'') + '~' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AG.AGENCY_ID) + '~' + RTRIM(AG.AGENCY_CODE) + '~' + AG.AGENCY_DISPLAY_NAME+ '~' + A.POLICY_DISP_VERSION AS POLICY_APP_NUMBER, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(B.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME, AG.AGENCY_DISPLAY_NAME AG_NAME, AG.AGENCY_CODE, AG.AGENCY_ID, RTRIM(RTRIM(B.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_NAME FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.CUSTOMER_ID = B.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_AGENCY_LIST AG WITH(NOLOCK) ON AG.AGENCY_ID = B.CUSTOMER_AGENCY_ID WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.CUSTOMER_ID) LIKE @CUSTOMER_ID AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.AGENCY_ID) LIKE @AGENCY_ID AND A.POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN POL_POLICY_PROCESS PPP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PPP.CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND PPP.POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID AND PPP.NEW_POLICY_VERSION_ID = POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID WHERE POL.CUSTOMER_ID = A.CUSTOMER_ID AND POL.POLICY_ID = A.POLICY_ID AND POLICY_NUMBER=A.POLICY_NUMBER AND ( (ISNULL(PPP.PROCESS_STATUS,'') = 'COMPLETE' AND ISNULL(PPP.REVERT_BACK,'N') = 'N' ) OR POL.POLICY_STATUS IN ( 'SUSPENDED','UISSUE','URENEW') ) ORDER BY POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID DESC)

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

PolicyDBCustomer.SQL: SELECT a.POLICY_ID,a.POLICY_VERSION_ID,a.POLICY_NUMBER,a.POLICY_DISP_VERSION, convert(varchar,a.POLICY_ID)+'~'+convert(varchar,a.POLICY_VERSION_ID)+'~'+a.POLICY_NUMBER + '~' + convert(varchar,a.APP_ID) + '~'+convert(varchar,a.APP_VERSION_ID) + '~' + isnull(a.APP_NUMBER,'') + '~' + convert(varchar, AG.AGENCY_ID) + '~' + RTRIM(AG.AGENCY_CODE) + '~' + AG.AGENCY_DISPLAY_NAME+ '~' + a.POLICY_DISP_VERSION AS POLICY_APP_NUMBER, convert(varchar,a.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME, AG.AGENCY_DISPLAY_NAME AG_NAME, AG.AGENCY_CODE, AG.AGENCY_ID, RTRIM(RTRIM(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_NAME FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.CUSTOMER_ID = b.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_AGENCY_LIST ag WITH(NOLOCK) ON ag.AGENCY_ID = b.CUSTOMER_AGENCY_ID WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.CUSTOMER_ID) like @CUSTOMER_ID AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.AGENCY_ID) like @AGENCY_ID and a.bill_type!='AB' and a.POLICY_VERSION_ID in(select top 1 POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID from POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN POL_POLICY_PROCESS PPP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PPP.CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND PPP.POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID AND PPP.NEW_POLICY_VERSION_ID = POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID where POL.CUSTOMER_ID = A.CUSTOMER_ID AND POL.POLICY_ID = A.POLICY_ID AND POL.POLICY_NUMBER=A.POLICY_NUMBER AND ( (ISNULL(PPP.PROCESS_STATUS,'') = 'COMPLETE' AND ISNULL(PPP.REVERT_BACK,'N') = 'N' ) OR POL.POLICY_STATUS IN ( 'SUSPENDED','UISSUE','URENEW') ) ORDER BY POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID DESC )

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

PolicyAgency.SQL: SELECT a.AGENCY_ID,d.AGENCY_CODE,a.POLICY_ID,a.POLICY_VERSION_ID,a.POLICY_NUMBER,a.POLICY_DISP_VERSION, convert(varchar,a.POLICY_ID)+'~'+convert(varchar,a.POLICY_VERSION_ID)+'~'+a.POLICY_NUMBER + '~' + convert(varchar,a.APP_ID) + '~'+convert(varchar,a.APP_VERSION_ID) + '~' + isnull(a.APP_NUMBER,'') + '~' + convert(varchar,a.CUSTOMER_ID)+ '~' + convert(varchar,a.AGENCY_ID) + '~' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(D.ALLOWS_CUSTOMER_SWEEP,'10964')) + '~' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') + '~' + ISNULL(a.POLICY_STATUS,'') AS POLICY_APP_NUMBER, convert(varchar,a.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME, ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') as CUSTOMER_NAME FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST a (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST b (NOLOCK) on a.CUSTOMER_ID = b.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_AGENCY_LIST d (NOLOCK) on d.AGENCY_ID = a.AGENCY_ID where RTRIM(LTRIM(d.AGENCY_CODE)) LIKE @AGENCY_CODE and a.BILL_TYPE != 'AB' and a.POLICY_VERSION_ID in (SELECT TOP 1 POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN POL_POLICY_PROCESS PPP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PPP.CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND PPP.POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID AND PPP.NEW_POLICY_VERSION_ID = POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID where POL.CUSTOMER_ID = A.CUSTOMER_ID AND POL.POLICY_ID = A.POLICY_ID AND POL.POLICY_NUMBER=A.POLICY_NUMBER AND ( (ISNULL(PPP.PROCESS_STATUS,'') = 'COMPLETE' AND ISNULL(PPP.REVERT_BACK,'N') = 'N' ) OR POL.POLICY_STATUS IN ( 'SUSPENDED','UISSUE','URENEW') ) ORDER BY POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID DESC )

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

County.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT COUNTY, ZIP FROM MNT_TERRITORY_CODES WITH(NOLOCK)

COUNTY.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT COUNTY, ZIP FROM MNT_TERRITORY_CODES WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COUNTY IS NOT NULL

COUNTYFORSTATE.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT COUNTY FROM MNT_TERRITORY_CODES WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COUNTY IS NOT NULL AND STATE=@STATE

TransactionCodes.SQL: SELECT TOP 50 TRAN_CODE, convert(varchar,TRAN_ID) + ',' + TRAN_CODE as TRAN_CODE1, DISPLAY_DESCRIPTION FROM ACT_TRANSACTION_CODES WITH(NOLOCK)

Lookup.SQL: SELECT TOP 50 LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID, LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES MLT WITH(NOLOCK) ON MLV.LOOKUP_ID = MLT.LOOKUP_ID WHERE MLT.LOOKUP_NAME = @LOOKUP_NAME

AddlInterest.SQL: SELECT A.HOLDER_ID, ISNULL(A.HOLDER_NAME,'') AS HOLDER_NAME, RTRIM(ISNULL(HOLDER_ADD1,'')) + ', ' + CASE WHEN ISNULL(HOLDER_ADD2,'') = '' THEN '' ELSE HOLDER_ADD2 + ', ' END + ISNULL(HOLDER_CITY,'') + ', ' + ISNULL(M.STATE_CODE,'') + ' ' + HOLDER_ZIP AS HOLDER_ADDRESS FROM MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST M WITH(NOLOCK) ON M.STATE_ID = HOLDER_STATE WHERE ISNULL(A.IS_ACTIVE,'N') = 'Y'

column.name: RTRIM(ISNULL(HOLDER_ADD1,'')) + ', ' + CASE WHEN ISNULL(HOLDER_ADD2,'') = '' THEN '' ELSE HOLDER_ADD2 + ', ' END + ISNULL(HOLDER_CITY,'') + ', ' + ISNULL(M.STATE_CODE,'') + ' ' + HOLDER_ZIP

AddlInterestWaterCraft.SQL: SELECT A.HOLDER_ID, ISNULL(A.HOLDER_NAME,'') AS HOLDER_NAME, RTRIM(ISNULL(HOLDER_ADD1,'')) + ', ' + CASE WHEN ISNULL(HOLDER_ADD2,'') = '' THEN '' ELSE HOLDER_ADD2 + ', ' END + ISNULL(HOLDER_CITY,'') + ', ' + ISNULL(M.STATE_CODE,'') + ' ' + HOLDER_ZIP AS HOLDER_ADDRESS FROM MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST M WITH(NOLOCK) ON M.STATE_ID = HOLDER_STATE WHERE ISNULL(A.IS_ACTIVE,'N') = 'Y'

AddlInterestTrailer.SQL: SELECT A.HOLDER_ID, ISNULL(A.HOLDER_NAME,'') AS HOLDER_NAME, RTRIM(ISNULL(HOLDER_ADD1,'')) + ', ' + CASE WHEN ISNULL(HOLDER_ADD2,'') = '' THEN '' ELSE HOLDER_ADD2 + ', ' END + ISNULL(HOLDER_CITY,'') + ', ' + ISNULL(M.STATE_CODE,'') + ' ' + HOLDER_ZIP AS HOLDER_ADDRESS FROM MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST M WITH(NOLOCK) ON M.STATE_ID = HOLDER_STATE WHERE ISNULL(A.IS_ACTIVE,'N') = 'Y'

AddlInterestEngine.SQL: SELECT A.HOLDER_ID, ISNULL(A.HOLDER_NAME,'') AS HOLDER_NAME, RTRIM(ISNULL(HOLDER_ADD1,'')) + ', ' + CASE WHEN ISNULL(HOLDER_ADD2,'') = '' THEN '' ELSE HOLDER_ADD2 + ', ' END + ISNULL(HOLDER_CITY,'') + ', ' + ISNULL(M.STATE_CODE,'') + ' ' + HOLDER_ZIP AS HOLDER_ADDRESS FROM MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST M WITH(NOLOCK) ON M.STATE_ID = HOLDER_STATE WHERE ISNULL(A.IS_ACTIVE,'N') = 'Y'

AddlInterestHomeowner.SQL: SELECT A.HOLDER_ID, ISNULL(A.HOLDER_NAME,'') AS HOLDER_NAME, RTRIM(ISNULL(HOLDER_ADD1,'')) + ', ' + CASE WHEN ISNULL(HOLDER_ADD2,'') = '' THEN '' ELSE HOLDER_ADD2 + ', ' END + ISNULL(HOLDER_CITY,'') + ', ' + ISNULL(M.STATE_CODE,'') + ' ' + HOLDER_ZIP AS HOLDER_ADDRESS FROM MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST M WITH(NOLOCK) ON M.STATE_ID = HOLDER_STATE WHERE ISNULL(A.IS_ACTIVE,'N') = 'Y'

Territory.SQL: select DISTINCT TERR from MNT_TERRITORY_CODES WITH(NOLOCK) where LOBID= @LOBID

ManufacturerMC.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT M.MANUFACTURER as Manufacturer FROM MNT_VIN_MOTORCYCLE_MASTER M WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES L WITH(NOLOCK) ON L.LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE=M.CLASS WHERE L.LOOKUP_ID=1188 AND @DATE BETWEEN ISNULL(EFFECTIVE_FROM_DATE,'01/01/1900') AND ISNULL(EFFECTIVE_TO_DATE,'01/01/3000')

MOTORCYCLE_MODEL.SQL: SELECT l.lookup_unique_id as TypeId ,m.Model as Model FROM MNT_VIN_MOTORCYCLE_MASTER M WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES L WITH(NOLOCK) ON L.LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE=M.CLASS WHERE M.MANUFACTURER=@Manufacturer AND L.LOOKUP_ID=1188 AND @DATE BETWEEN ISNULL(EFFECTIVE_FROM_DATE,'01/01/1900') AND ISNULL(EFFECTIVE_TO_DATE,'01/01/3000')

Customer.SQL: SELECT CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_CODE, ISNULL(CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') as Name , ISNULL(CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')+'^'+CUSTOMER_ADDRESS1+'^'+CUSTOMER_ADDRESS2+'^'+CUSTOMER_CITY+'^'+CUSTOMER_STATE+'^'+CUSTOMER_ZIP as NAME1 FROM CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST WITH(NOLOCK)

CustLookupForm.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT CLT.CUSTOMER_ID, CLT.CUSTOMER_CODE, ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') as Name , ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')+'^'+CLT.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS1+'^'+ CLT.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS2+'^'+CLT.CUSTOMER_CITY+'^'+CLT.CUSTOMER_STATE+'^'+CLT.CUSTOMER_ZIP as NAME1 FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.POLICY_LOB = MNT.LOB_ID INNER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CLT WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLT.CUSTOMER_ID=POL.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST PCPL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN POL_POLICY_PROCESS PPP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PPP.CUSTOMER_ID = PCPL.CUSTOMER_ID AND PPP.POLICY_ID = PCPL.POLICY_ID AND PPP.NEW_POLICY_VERSION_ID = PCPL.POLICY_VERSION_ID WHERE PCPL.CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND PCPL.POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID AND ( (ISNULL(PPP.PROCESS_STATUS,'') = 'COMPLETE' AND ISNULL(PPP.REVERT_BACK,'N') = 'N' ) OR PCPL.POLICY_STATUS IN ( 'SUSPENDED','UISSUE','URENEW') ) ORDER BY PCPL.POLICY_VERSION_ID DESC )

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

CustLookupFormAgency.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT CLT.CUSTOMER_ID, CLT.CUSTOMER_CODE, ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') as Name , ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')+'^'+CLT.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS1+'^'+ CLT.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS2+'^'+CLT.CUSTOMER_CITY+'^'+CLT.CUSTOMER_STATE+'^'+CLT.CUSTOMER_ZIP as NAME1 FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.POLICY_LOB = MNT.LOB_ID INNER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CLT WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLT.CUSTOMER_ID=POL.CUSTOMER_ID INNER JOIN MNT_AGENCY_LIST AGN WITH(NOLOCK) ON AGN.AGENCY_ID = POL.AGENCY_ID WHERE POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 MAX(POLICY_VERSION_ID) FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID ORDER BY POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID DESC)and AGN.AGENCY_CODE=@systemID

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

NFS.SQL: SELECT POLICY_NUMBER, LOB_DESC, convert(varchar(10),POLICY_ID)+'^'+convert(varchar(10),POLICY_VERSION_ID)+'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.CUSTOMER_ID) + '^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.POLICY_NUMBER) + '^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),isnull(NON_SUFFICIENT_FUND_FEES,0)) AS POL_INFORM,POLICY_LOB FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.POLICY_LOB = MNT.LOB_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ACT_INSTALL_PLAN_DETAIL ACT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.INSTALL_PLAN_ID = ACT.IDEN_PLAN_ID

PREM_NOTICE.SQL: SELECT POLICY_NUMBER, LOB_DESC, convert(varchar(10),POLICY_ID)+'^'+convert(varchar(10),POLICY_VERSION_ID)+'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.CUSTOMER_ID) + '^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.POLICY_NUMBER) + '^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),isnull(NON_SUFFICIENT_FUND_FEES,0)) AS POL_INFORM,POLICY_LOB, convert(varchar,POL.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME, ISNULL(CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') as Name FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CCL WITH(NOLOCK) on POL.CUSTOMER_ID = CCL.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.POLICY_LOB = MNT.LOB_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ACT_INSTALL_PLAN_DETAIL ACT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.INSTALL_PLAN_ID = ACT.IDEN_PLAN_ID WHERE POL.BILL_TYPE = 'DB' AND POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 PCPP.POLICY_VERSION_ID FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST PCPP WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN POL_POLICY_PROCESS PPP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PPP.CUSTOMER_ID = PCPP.CUSTOMER_ID AND PPP.POLICY_ID = PCPP.POLICY_ID AND PPP.NEW_POLICY_VERSION_ID = PCPP.POLICY_VERSION_ID WHERE PCPP.CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND PCPP.POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID AND PCPP.POLICY_NUMBER = POL.POLICY_NUMBER AND ( (ISNULL(PPP.PROCESS_STATUS,'') = 'COMPLETE' AND ISNULL(PPP.REVERT_BACK,'N') = 'N' ) OR POL.POLICY_STATUS IN ( 'SUSPENDED','UISSUE','URENEW') ) ORDER BY PCPP.POLICY_VERSION_ID DESC)

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(CCL.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

AGENCYLOGIN.SQL: SELECT POLICY_NUMBER, LOB_DESC, convert(varchar(10),POL.POLICY_ID)+'^'+convert(varchar(10),POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID)+'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.CUSTOMER_ID) + '^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.POLICY_LOB) + '^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.POLICY_NUMBER) + '^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),isnull(NON_SUFFICIENT_FUND_FEES,0)) AS POL_INFORM, POLICY_LOB, RTRIM(RTRIM(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_NAME,POLICY_DISP_VERSION, dbo.fun_GetPolicyDisplayStatus(POL.CUSTOMER_ID,POL.POLICY_ID,POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID) AS POLICY_STATUS, POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID,PPP.PROCESS_ID,ISNULL(PPM.PROCESS_DESC,'') PROCESS_DESC , ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR,PPP.EFFECTIVE_DATETIME,101),'') EFFECTIVE_DATETIME, POL.POLICY_NUMBER + '^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID) AS ORDERBY FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST B WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.CUSTOMER_ID=POL.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.POLICY_LOB = MNT.LOB_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ACT_INSTALL_PLAN_DETAIL ACT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.INSTALL_PLAN_ID = ACT.IDEN_PLAN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_AGENCY_LIST MAL WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.AGENCY_ID = MAL.AGENCY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN POL_POLICY_PROCESS PPP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PPP.CUSTOMER_ID=POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND PPP.POLICY_ID=POL.POLICY_ID AND PPP.NEW_POLICY_VERSION_ID=POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND PPP.PROCESS_STATUS!='ROLLBACK' LEFT OUTER JOIN POL_PROCESS_MASTER PPM WITH(NOLOCK) ON PPM.PROCESS_ID=PPP.PROCESS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN POL_POLICY_STATUS_MASTER PPSM WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.POLICY_STATUS = PPSM.POLICY_STATUS_CODE WHERE MAL.AGENCY_CODE=@AGENCY_CODE AND POLICY_NUMBER IS NOT NULL --AND POL.POLICY_STATUS != 'Suspended' AND POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID >= (SELECT MIN(NEW_POLICY_VERSION_ID) FROM POL_POLICY_PROCESS PPPS WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST PCPLS WITH(NOLOCK) ON PPPS.CUSTOMER_ID=PCPLS.CUSTOMER_ID AND PPPS.POLICY_ID=PCPLS.POLICY_ID AND PPPS.NEW_POLICY_VERSION_ID=PCPLS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND PPPS.PROCESS_STATUS!='ROLLBACK' LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_AGENCY_LIST MAL WITH(NOLOCK) ON PCPLS.AGENCY_ID = MAL.AGENCY_ID WHERE PPPS.PROCESS_ID IN (25,18) AND MAL.AGENCY_CODE=@AGENCY_CODE and PPPS.PROCESS_STATUS='COMPLETE'-- MIN OF NBS OR RENEWAL AND ISNULL(REVERT_BACK,'N') = 'N') AND POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID in (SELECT POLICY_VERSION_ID FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL1 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE POL.CUSTOMER_ID = POL1.CUSTOMER_ID AND POL.POLICY_ID = POL1.POLICY_ID AND POL1.CURRENT_TERM IN ( SELECT TOP 2 CURRENT_TERM FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL2 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE POL1.CUSTOMER_ID = POL2.CUSTOMER_ID AND POL1.POLICY_ID = POL2.POLICY_ID ORDER BY APP_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC))

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

AGENCYLOGINAUTOID.SQL: SELECT POLICY_NUMBER, LOB_DESC, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.POLICY_ID)+ '^'+CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID)+ '^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.CUSTOMER_ID) + '^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.POLICY_LOB) + '^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.POLICY_NUMBER) + '^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),ISNULL(NON_SUFFICIENT_FUND_FEES,0))+ '^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),ISNULL(POL_VEHICLES.VEHICLE_ID,0)) AS POL_INFORM, POLICY_LOB, RTRIM(RTRIM(B.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(B.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_NAME, POLICY_DISP_VERSION, POLICY_STATUS , dbo.fun_GetPolicyDisplayStatus(POL.CUSTOMER_ID,POL.POLICY_ID,POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID) POLICY_DISP_STATUS , POL_VEHICLES.VEHICLE_ID, POL_VEHICLES.VIN, ISNULL(VEHICLE_YEAR,'') + '-' + ISNULL(MAKE,'') + '-' + ISNULL(MODEL,'') AS YR_MAKE_MODEL FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST B WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.CUSTOMER_ID=POL.CUSTOMER_ID INNER JOIN POL_VEHICLES WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL_VEHICLES.CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND POL_VEHICLES.POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID AND POL_VEHICLES.POLICY_VERSION_ID = POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND POL_VEHICLES.IS_ACTIVE='Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER_MULTILINGUAL MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.POLICY_LOB = MNT.LOB_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ACT_INSTALL_PLAN_DETAIL ACT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.INSTALL_PLAN_ID = ACT.IDEN_PLAN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_AGENCY_LIST MAL WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.AGENCY_ID = MAL.AGENCY_ID WHERE MAL.AGENCY_CODE=@AGENCY_CODE AND POLICY_NUMBER IS NOT NULL AND (POLICY_STATUS = 'NORMAL' OR POLICY_STATUS = 'URENEW' OR POLICY_STATUS = 'MREINSTATE'OR POLICY_STATUS = 'RENEWED'OR POLICY_STATUS = 'MENDORSE') AND POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT TOP 2 POLICY_VERSION_ID FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL1 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE POL1.CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND POL1.POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID ORDER BY POLICY_VERSION_ID DESC)

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

ARREPORT4CUST.SQL: SELECT distinct POLICY_NUMBER,LOB_DESC, convert(varchar(10),POLICY_ID)+'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.CUSTOMER_ID) +'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),POL.POLICY_NUMBER) AS POL_INFORM,POLICY_LOB, ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') +' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') AS CUSTOMER_NAME ,POL.BILL_TYPE FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.POLICY_LOB = MNT.LOB_ID INNER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CLT WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLT.CUSTOMER_ID=POL.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE POL.CUSTOMER_ID = @CUSTOMER_ID AND POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 max(POLICY_VERSION_ID) FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID AND POLICY_NUMBER = POL.POLICY_NUMBER)

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

ARREPORT4AGENCY.SQL: SELECT distinct POLICY_NUMBER,LOB_DESC, convert(varchar(10),POLICY_ID)+'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.CUSTOMER_ID) +'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),POL.POLICY_NUMBER)+'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID) AS POL_INFORM,POLICY_LOB, ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') +' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') AS CUSTOMER_NAME ,(case when POL.BILL_TYPE='DB'then 'DIR' else POL.BILL_TYPE end) as BILL_TYPE FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER_MULTILINGUAL MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.POLICY_LOB = MNT.LOB_ID INNER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CLT WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLT.CUSTOMER_ID=POL.CUSTOMER_ID INNER JOIN MNT_AGENCY_LIST AGN WITH(NOLOCK) ON AGN.AGENCY_ID = POL.AGENCY_ID WHERE POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 max(POLICY_VERSION_ID) FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID AND POLICY_NUMBER=POL.POLICY_NUMBER )

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

ARREPORT.SQL: SELECT distinct POLICY_NUMBER, LOB_DESC, convert(varchar(10),POLICY_ID)+'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.CUSTOMER_ID) +'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),POL.POLICY_NUMBER) +'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID) AS POL_INFORM,POLICY_LOB,ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') +' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') AS CUSTOMER_NAME,(case when POL.BILL_TYPE='DB'then 'DIR' else POL.BILL_TYPE end) as BILL_TYPE FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER_MULTILINGUAL MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.POLICY_LOB = MNT.LOB_ID INNER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CLT WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLT.CUSTOMER_ID=POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 max(POLICY_VERSION_ID) FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID AND POLICY_NUMBER = POL.POLICY_NUMBER)

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

ARREPORTAGENCY.SQL: SELECT distinct POLICY_NUMBER, LOB_DESC, convert(varchar(10),POLICY_ID)+'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.CUSTOMER_ID) +'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),POL.POLICY_NUMBER) +'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID) AS POL_INFORM,POLICY_LOB,ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') +' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') AS CUSTOMER_NAME,(case when POL.BILL_TYPE='DB'then 'DIR' else POL.BILL_TYPE end) as BILL_TYPE FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER_MULTILINGUAL MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.POLICY_LOB = MNT.LOB_ID INNER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CLT WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLT.CUSTOMER_ID=POL.CUSTOMER_ID INNER JOIN MNT_AGENCY_LIST AGN WITH(NOLOCK) ON AGN.AGENCY_ID = POL.AGENCY_ID AND POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 max(POLICY_VERSION_ID) FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID AND POLICY_NUMBER = POL.POLICY_NUMBER) and AGN.AGENCY_CODE=@systemID

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

ARREPORT4AGENCYCUST.SQL: SELECT distinct POLICY_NUMBER,LOB_DESC, convert(varchar(10),POLICY_ID)+'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),POL.CUSTOMER_ID) +'^' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),POL.POLICY_NUMBER) AS POL_INFORM,POLICY_LOB, ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') +' ' + ISNULL(CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') AS CUSTOMER_NAME,(case when POL.BILL_TYPE='DB'then 'DIR' else POL.BILL_TYPE end) as BILL_TYPE FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER_MULTILINGUAL MNT WITH(NOLOCK) ON POL.POLICY_LOB = MNT.LOB_ID INNER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CLT WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLT.CUSTOMER_ID=POL.CUSTOMER_ID INNER JOIN MNT_AGENCY_LIST AGN WITH(NOLOCK) ON AGN.AGENCY_ID = POL.AGENCY_ID WHERE POL.CUSTOMER_ID = @CUSTOMER_ID AND POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 max(POLICY_VERSION_ID) FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID AND POLICY_NUMBER=POL.POLICY_NUMBER)

LookupTest.SQL: SELECT LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID, LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES MLT WITH(NOLOCK) ON MLV.LOOKUP_ID = MLT.LOOKUP_ID

LookupTable.SQL: SELECT LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID, LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC,LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE,LOOKUP_VALUE_ID FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES MLT WITH(NOLOCK) ON MLV.LOOKUP_ID = MLT.LOOKUP_ID WHERE MLT.LOOKUP_NAME = @LOOKUP_NAME

BusinessType.SQL: SELECT ACTIVITY_ID,ACTIVITY_DESC FROM MNT_ACTIVITY_MASTER WITH(NOLOCK) where TYPE=11109

Agency.SQL: SELECT A.AGENCY_DISPLAY_NAME NAME, A.AGENCY_CODE, A.AGENCY_ID FROM MNT_AGENCY_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE A.AGENCY_CODE != (SELECT REIN_COMAPANY_CODE FROM MNT_REIN_COMAPANY_LIST LIST WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MNT_SYSTEM_PARAMS PARM WITH(NOLOCK) ON PARM.SYS_CARRIER_ID = LIST.REIN_COMAPANY_ID )

AgencyLookup.SQL: SELECT A.AGENCY_DISPLAY_NAME as NAME,A.AGENCY_DISPLAY_NAME+'^'+AGENCY_ADD1+'^'+AGENCY_ADD2+'^'+AGENCY_CITY+'^'+AGENCY_STATE+'^'+AGENCY_ZIP as NAME1, A.AGENCY_CODE, A.AGENCY_ID FROM MNT_AGENCY_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE A.AGENCY_CODE != (SELECT REIN_COMAPANY_CODE FROM MNT_REIN_COMAPANY_LIST LIST WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MNT_SYSTEM_PARAMS PARM WITH(NOLOCK) ON PARM.SYS_CARRIER_ID = LIST.REIN_COMAPANY_ID )

TaxLookup.SQL: SELECT A.TAX_NAME NAME, A.TAX_CODE, A.TAX_ID, A.TAX_NAME+'^'+TAX_ADDRESS1+'^'+TAX_ADDRESS2+'^'+TAX_CITY+'^'+TAX_STATE+'^'+TAX_ZIP as NAME1 FROM MNT_TAX_ENTITY_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK)

Tax.SQL: SELECT A.TAX_NAME NAME, A.TAX_CODE, A.TAX_ID FROM MNT_TAX_ENTITY_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK)

Holder.SQL: SELECT A.HOLDER_NAME NAME, A.HOLDER_CODE, A.HOLDER_ID FROM MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK)

VendorLookup.SQL: SELECT ISNULL(COMPANY_NAME,'') As NAME, VENDOR_CODE, VENDOR_ID, ISNULL(COMPANY_NAME,'')+'^'+CHK_MAIL_ADD1+'^'+CHK_MAIL_ADD2+'^'+CHK_MAIL_CITY+'^'+CHK_MAIL_STATE+'^'+CHK_MAIL_ZIP as NAME1 FROM MNT_VENDOR_LIST WITH(NOLOCK)

VendorCompLookup.SQL: SELECT ISNULL(COMPANY_NAME,'') As COMPANY_NAME, IsNull(VENDOR_FNAME,'') + ' ' + IsNull(VENDOR_LNAME,'') As NAME, VENDOR_CODE, VENDOR_ID, IsNull(VENDOR_FNAME,'') + ' ' + IsNull(VENDOR_LNAME,'')+'^'+VENDOR_ADD1+'^'+VENDOR_ADD2+'^'+VENDOR_CITY+'^'+VENDOR_STATE+'^'+VENDOR_ZIP as NAME1 FROM MNT_VENDOR_LIST WITH(NOLOCK)

Vendor.SQL: SELECT IsNull(COMPANY_NAME,'') As NAME, VENDOR_CODE, VENDOR_ID FROM MNT_VENDOR_LIST WITH(NOLOCK)

CustAndStateLookupForm.SQL: SELECT cast(CUSTOMER_ID as varchar(20))+'^'+isnull(customer_state,'') as CUSTOMER_ID , CUSTOMER_CODE, isnull(CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + isnull(CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') as Name FROM CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE IS_ACTIVE != 'N'

CoverageCode.SQL: SELECT COVERAGE_ID, ISNULL(COVERAGE_CODE,'') AS COVERAGE_CODE, ISNULL(COVERAGE_DESCRIPTION,'') AS COVERAGE_DESCRIPTION FROM MNT_REINSURANCE_COVERAGECODE WITH(NOLOCK)

ReinsuranceAccountNumber.SQL: SELECT REIN_COMAPANY_ID, ISNULL(REIN_COMAPANY_NAME,'') AS REIN_COMAPANY_NAME, ISNULL(REIN_COMAPANY_ACC_NUMBER,'') AS REIN_COMAPANY_ACC_NUMBER FROM MNT_REIN_COMAPANY_LIST WITH(NOLOCK)

ClassCode.SQL: SELECT CLASS_CODE_ID, ISNULL(CLASS_CODE,'') AS CLASS_CODE, ISNULL(CLASS_CODE_DESCRIPTION,'') AS CLASS_CODE_DESCRIPTION FROM MNT_REINSURANCE_CLASS_CODE WITH(NOLOCK)

ClaimsSubAdjuster.SQL: SELECT ADJUSTER_ID,SUB_ADJUSTER,SUB_ADJUSTER_CONTACT_NAME FROM CLM_ADJUSTER WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ADJUSTER_CODE = @ADJUSTER_CODE

PartyName_Expert.SQL:
SELECT ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_NAME,'') + '^' + ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_ADDRESS1,'') + '^' + ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_ADDRESS2,'') + '^' + ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_CITY,'') + '^' + ISNULL(CAST(EXPERT_SERVICE_STATE AS VARCHAR(10)),'') + '^' + ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_ZIP,'') + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_ID,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_VENDOR_CODE,'') AS EXPERT_DATA, EXPERT_SERVICE_FEDRERAL_ID, ISNULL(CLM_TYPE_DETAIL.DETAIL_TYPE_DESCRIPTION,'') AS EXPERT_SERVICE_PROVIDER_TYPE_DESC, ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_NAME,'') EXPERT_SERVICE_NAME,ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_ADDRESS1,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_ADDRESS2,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_CITY,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST.STATE_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_ZIP,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(MNT_COUNTRY_LIST.COUNTRY_NAME,'') AS EXPERT_SERVICE_ADDRESS,EXPERT_SERVICE_VENDOR_CODE, ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_MASTER_VENDOR_CODE,'') AS EXPERT_SERVICE_MASTER_VENDOR_CODE, CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_ID,0) AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_TYPE,0) AS VARCHAR) + '~' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_TYPE_DESC,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_NAME,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_ADDRESS1,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_ADDRESS2,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_CITY,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_STATE,0) AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_ZIP,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_VENDOR_CODE,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_CONTACT_NAME,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_CONTACT_PHONE,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_CONTACT_EMAIL,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_FEDRERAL_ID,'') AS VARCHAR(300)) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_1099_PROCESSING_OPTION,0) AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_COUNTRY,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_MASTER_VENDOR_CODE,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' +
ISNULL((SELECT MASTER.EXPERT_SERVICE_VENDOR_CODE FROM CLM_EXPERT_SERVICE_PROVIDERS MASTER WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,MASTER.EXPERT_SERVICE_ID) = CLM_EXPERT_SERVICE_PROVIDERS.EXPERT_SERVICE_MASTER_VENDOR_CODE),'') + '^' +
CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_TYPE_DESC,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(PARTY_DETAIL,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(AGE,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXTENT_OF_INJURY,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(OTHER_DETAILS,'') AS VARCHAR(500)) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(BANK_NAME,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(ACCOUNT_NUMBER,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(ACCOUNT_NAME,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_CONTACT_PHONE_EXT,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(EXPERT_SERVICE_CONTACT_FAX,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(PARENT_ADJUSTER,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^'+
CAST(ISNULL(ADJUSTER_NAME,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(MAIL_1099_NAME,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(MAIL_1099_ADD1,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(MAIL_1099_ADD2,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(MAIL_1099_CITY,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(MAIL_1099_STATE,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(MAIL_1099_COUNTRY,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(W9_FORM,'') AS VARCHAR) + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(MAIL_1099_ZIP,'') AS VARCHAR) AS EXPERT_DATA_PARTY, '1' AS DECRYPT FROM CLM_EXPERT_SERVICE_PROVIDERS WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLM_TYPE_DETAIL WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLM_EXPERT_SERVICE_PROVIDERS.EXPERT_SERVICE_TYPE = CLM_TYPE_DETAIL.DETAIL_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLM_EXPERT_SERVICE_PROVIDERS.EXPERT_SERVICE_STATE = MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST.STATE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) ON MNT_COUNTRY_LIST.COUNTRY_ID = CLM_EXPERT_SERVICE_PROVIDERS.EXPERT_SERVICE_COUNTRY
LEFT OUTER JOIN CLM_ADJUSTER WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLM_EXPERT_SERVICE_PROVIDERS.PARENT_ADJUSTER=CLM_ADJUSTER.ADJUSTER_ID WHERE ISNULL(CLM_EXPERT_SERVICE_PROVIDERS.IS_ACTIVE,'N')='Y'

PartyName_Claimant.SQL: SELECT ISNULL(C.FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(C.MIDDLE_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(C.LAST_NAME,'') + '^' + ISNULL(C.ADDRESS1,'') + '^' + ISNULL(C.ADDRESS2,'') + '^' + ISNULL(C.CITY,'') + '^' + ISNULL(C.STATE,'') + '^' + ISNULL(C.ZIP_CODE,'') CLAIMANT_DATA,ISNULL(C.FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(C.MIDDLE_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(C.LAST_NAME,'') NAME FROM POL_APPLICANT_LIST A WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CLM_CLAIM_INFO B WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.CUSTOMER_ID = B.CUSTOMER_ID AND A.POLICY_ID = B.POLICY_ID AND A.POLICY_VERSION_ID = B.POLICY_VERSION_ID) INNER JOIN CLT_APPLICANT_LIST C WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APPLICANT_ID = C.APPLICANT_ID WHERE B.CLAIM_ID = @CLAIM_ID AND C.IS_ACTIVE='Y'

PartyName_Additional_Insured.SQL: SELECT ISNULL(CAL.FIRST_NAME,'') + CASE ISNULL(CAL.MIDDLE_NAME,'') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE + ' ' + CAL.MIDDLE_NAME END +' '+ISNULL(CAL.LAST_NAME,'') + '^' + ISNULL(CAL.ADDRESS1,'') + '^' + ISNULL(CAL.ADDRESS2,'') + '^' + ISNULL(CAL.CITY,'') + '^' + ISNULL(CAL.STATE,'') + '^' + ISNULL(CAL.ZIP_CODE,'') + '^' + ISNULL(CAL.PHONE,'') + '^' + ISNULL(CAL.EMAIL,'') + '^' + ISNULL(CAL.EXT,'') ADDITIONAL_INSURED_DATA,ISNULL(CAL.FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CAL.MIDDLE_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CAL.LAST_NAME,'') NAME FROM CLT_APPLICANT_LIST CAL WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN POL_APPLICANT_LIST PAL WITH(NOLOCK) ON CAL.CUSTOMER_ID = PAL.CUSTOMER_ID AND CAL.APPLICANT_ID= PAL.APPLICANT_ID INNER JOIN CLM_CLAIM_INFO CCI WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAL.CUSTOMER_ID = CCI.CUSTOMER_ID AND PAL.POLICY_ID= CCI.POLICY_ID AND PAL.POLICY_VERSION_ID = CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID WHERE CCI.CLAIM_ID = @CLAIM_ID AND PAL.IS_PRIMARY_APPLICANT != 1

PartyName_ParentAdjuster.SQL: SELECT ISNULL(NAME,'') + '^' + ISNULL(ADDRESS1,'') + '^' + ISNULL(ADDRESS2,'') + '^' + ISNULL(CITY,'') + '^' + ISNULL(CAST(STATE AS VARCHAR(10)),'') + '^' + ISNULL(ZIP,'') + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(PARTY_ID,'') AS VARCHAR) AS EXPERT_DATA, ISNULL(NAME,'') NAME,ISNULL(ADDRESS1,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDRESS2,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CITY,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST.STATE_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ZIP,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(MNT_COUNTRY_LIST.COUNTRY_NAME,'') AS ADDRESS FROM CLM_PARTIES WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLM_PARTIES.STATE = MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST.STATE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) ON MNT_COUNTRY_LIST.COUNTRY_ID = CLM_PARTIES.COUNTRY WHERE ISNULL(CLM_PARTIES.IS_ACTIVE,'N')='Y' AND CLM_PARTIES.PARTY_TYPE_ID=12

PartyNameClaims_ParentAdjuster.SQL: SELECT ISNULL(ADJUSTER_NAME,'') + '^' + ISNULL(SUB_ADJUSTER_ADDRESS1,'') + '^' + ISNULL(SUB_ADJUSTER_ADDRESS2,'') + '^' + ISNULL(SUB_ADJUSTER_CITY,'') + '^' + ISNULL(CAST(SUB_ADJUSTER_STATE AS VARCHAR(10)),'') + '^' + ISNULL(SUB_ADJUSTER_ZIP,'') + '^' + CAST(ISNULL(ADJUSTER_ID,'') AS VARCHAR) AS EXPERT_DATA, ISNULL(ADJUSTER_NAME,'') NAME,ISNULL(SUB_ADJUSTER_ADDRESS1,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(SUB_ADJUSTER_ADDRESS2,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(SUB_ADJUSTER_CITY,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST.STATE_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(SUB_ADJUSTER_ZIP,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(MNT_COUNTRY_LIST.COUNTRY_NAME,'') AS ADDRESS FROM CLM_ADJUSTER WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) ON CLM_ADJUSTER.SUB_ADJUSTER_STATE = MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST.STATE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) ON MNT_COUNTRY_LIST.COUNTRY_ID = CLM_ADJUSTER.SUB_ADJUSTER_COUNTRY WHERE ISNULL(CLM_ADJUSTER.IS_ACTIVE,'N')='Y'

CustomerName.SQL: SELECT ISNULL(CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') as NAME, CUSTOMER_CODE , cast(CUSTOMER_ID as varchar(20))as CUSTOMER_ID FROM CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST WITH(NOLOCK)

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

BussDesc.SQL: SELECT LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID, LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC,LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE,LOOKUP_VALUE_ID FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES MLT WITH(NOLOCK) ON MLV.LOOKUP_ID = MLT.LOOKUP_ID WHERE MLT.LOOKUP_NAME = @LOOKUP_NAME

DBPolicyForNSF.SQL: SELECT a.POLICY_ID,a.POLICY_VERSION_ID,a.POLICY_NUMBER,a.POLICY_DISP_VERSION, convert(varchar,a.POLICY_ID)+'~'+convert(varchar,a.POLICY_VERSION_ID)+'~'+a.POLICY_NUMBER + '~' + convert(varchar,a.APP_ID) + '~'+convert(varchar,a.APP_VERSION_ID) + '~' + isnull(c.APP_NUMBER,'') + '~' + convert(varchar,a.customer_id) + '~' + ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR,d.NON_SUFFICIENT_FUND_FEES),'') + '~' + ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR,d.INSTALLMENT_FEES),'') AS POLICY_APP_NUMBER, convert(varchar,a.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME , ISNULL(CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') as Name FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.CUSTOMER_ID = b.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_LIST c WITH(NOLOCK) on a.APP_ID = c.APP_ID AND a.APP_VERSION_ID = c.APP_VERSION_ID AND a.CUSTOMER_ID = c.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ACT_INSTALL_PLAN_DETAIL d WITH(NOLOCK) ON d.IDEN_PLAN_ID = a.INSTALL_PLAN_ID WHERE IsNull(a.BILL_TYPE,'') = 'DB' AND A.POLICY_VERSION_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN POL_POLICY_PROCESS PPP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PPP.CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND PPP.POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID AND PPP.NEW_POLICY_VERSION_ID = POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID WHERE POL.CUSTOMER_ID = A.CUSTOMER_ID AND POL.POLICY_ID = A.POLICY_ID AND POLICY_NUMBER=A.POLICY_NUMBER and BILL_TYPE='DB' AND ( (ISNULL(PPP.PROCESS_STATUS,'') = 'COMPLETE' AND ISNULL(PPP.REVERT_BACK,'N') = 'N' ) OR POL.POLICY_STATUS IN ( 'SUSPENDED','UISSUE','URENEW') ) ORDER BY POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID DESC )

column.name: RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(RTRIM(LTRIM(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME))))+ case ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') when '' then '' else ' ' end + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,''))) + ' ' + RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')))))

PolicyForFeeRev.SQL: SELECT a.POLICY_ID,a.POLICY_VERSION_ID,a.POLICY_NUMBER,a.POLICY_DISP_VERSION, convert(varchar,a.POLICY_ID)+'~'+convert(varchar,a.POLICY_VERSION_ID)+'~'+a.POLICY_NUMBER + '~' + convert(varchar,a.APP_ID) + '~'+convert(varchar,a.APP_VERSION_ID) + '~' + isnull(a.APP_NUMBER,'') + '~' + a.POLICY_LOB AS POLICY_APP_NUMBER, convert(varchar,a.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME, RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(b.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_NAME FROM POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.CUSTOMER_ID = b.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE a.POLICY_VERSION_ID in (select top 1 POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID from POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN POL_POLICY_PROCESS PPP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PPP.CUSTOMER_ID = POL.CUSTOMER_ID AND PPP.POLICY_ID = POL.POLICY_ID AND PPP.NEW_POLICY_VERSION_ID = POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID where POL.CUSTOMER_ID = A.CUSTOMER_ID AND POL.POLICY_ID = A.POLICY_ID AND POLICY_NUMBER=a.POLICY_NUMBER AND ( (ISNULL(PPP.PROCESS_STATUS,'') = 'COMPLETE' AND ISNULL(PPP.REVERT_BACK,'N') = 'N' ) OR POL.POLICY_STATUS IN ( 'SUSPENDED','UISSUE','URENEW') ) ORDER BY POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID DESC)

CopyDivisionAddress.SQL: SELECT DIV_NAME,ISNULL(DIV_ADD1,'')+'~'+ISNULL(DIV_ADD2,'')+'~'+ISNULL(DIV_CITY,'')+'~'+ISNULL(DIV_STATE,'')+'~'+ISNULL(DIV_ZIP,'')+'~'+ISNULL(DIV_COUNTRY,'')+'~'+ISNULL(DIV_PHONE,'')+'~'+ISNULL(DIV_EXT,'')+'~'+ISNULL(DIV_FAX,'')+'~'+ISNULL(DIV_EMAIL,'') AS DIV_ADDRESS ,CASE WHEN ISNULL(DIV_ADD1 ,'')='' THEN '' ELSE + DIV_ADD1 + ', ' END + CASE WHEN ISNULL(DIV_ADD2 ,'')='' THEN '' ELSE + DIV_ADD2 + ', ' END + ISNULL(DIV_CITY ,'')+', '+ ISNULL(MCSL.STATE_NAME ,'')+' '+ ISNULL(DIV_ZIP,'') AS DIV_ADDR FROM MNT_DIV_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST MCSL WITH(NOLOCK) ON MNT_DIV_LIST.DIV_STATE = MCSL.STATE_ID WHERE MNT_DIV_LIST.IS_ACTIVE='Y'

ClaimsDocMerge.SQL: SELECT CCI.CLAIM_ID, CCI.CLAIM_NUMBER AS CLAIM_NUMBER, CCI.POLICY_ID, PCPL.POLICY_NUMBER AS POLICY_NUMBER, CONVERT(VARCHAR,CCI.CLAIM_ID)+'~'+CCI.CLAIM_NUMBER+'~'+ CONVERT(VARCHAR,CCI.POLICY_ID)+'~'+PCPL.POLICY_NUMBER+'~'+ CONVERT(VARCHAR,CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID) AS CLAIM_POLICY_NUMBER, CONVERT(VARCHAR,CCI.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME FROM CLM_CLAIM_INFO CCI WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST PCPL WITH(NOLOCK) ON CCI.CUSTOMER_ID = PCPL.CUSTOMER_ID AND CCI.POLICY_ID = PCPL.POLICY_ID AND CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PCPL.POLICY_VERSION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CCL WITH(NOLOCK) ON CCI.CUSTOMER_ID = CCL.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE CCI.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND CCI.POLICY_ID not in (0) AND CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID not in (0) and ISNULL(PCPL.POLICY_NUMBER,'') NOT IN ('')

ClaimsCustomerDocMerge.SQL: SELECT CCI.CLAIM_ID, CCI.CLAIM_NUMBER AS CLAIM_NUMBER, CCI.POLICY_ID, PCPL.POLICY_NUMBER AS POLICY_NUMBER, CONVERT(VARCHAR,CCI.CLAIM_ID)+'~'+CCI.CLAIM_NUMBER+'~'+ CONVERT(VARCHAR,CCI.POLICY_ID)+'~'+PCPL.POLICY_NUMBER+'~'+ CONVERT(VARCHAR,CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID) AS CLAIM_POLICY_NUMBER, CONVERT(VARCHAR,CCI.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME FROM CLM_CLAIM_INFO CCI WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST PCPL WITH(NOLOCK) ON CCI.CUSTOMER_ID = PCPL.CUSTOMER_ID AND CCI.POLICY_ID = PCPL.POLICY_ID AND CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PCPL.POLICY_VERSION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CCL WITH(NOLOCK) ON CCI.CUSTOMER_ID = CCL.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE CCI.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y'AND CCI.CUSTOMER_ID = @CUSTID AND CCI.POLICY_ID NOT IN (0) AND CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID NOT IN (0) AND ISNULL(PCPL.POLICY_NUMBER,'') NOT IN ('')

ClaimPolicyCustomerDocMerge.SQL: SELECT CCI.CLAIM_ID, CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID, CCI.CLAIM_NUMBER AS CLAIM_NUMBER, CCI.POLICY_ID, PCPL.POLICY_NUMBER AS POLICY_NUMBER, CONVERT(VARCHAR,CCI.CLAIM_ID)+'~'+CCI.CLAIM_NUMBER+'~'+ CONVERT(VARCHAR,CCI.POLICY_ID)+'~'+PCPL.POLICY_NUMBER+'~'+ CONVERT(VARCHAR,CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID) AS CLAIM_POLICY_NUMBER, CONVERT(VARCHAR,CCI.CUSTOMER_ID) + '~'+RTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'')) + ' ' + ISNULL(CCL.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'')) AS CUSTOMER_ID_NAME FROM CLM_CLAIM_INFO CCI WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST PCPL WITH(NOLOCK) ON CCI.CUSTOMER_ID = PCPL.CUSTOMER_ID AND CCI.POLICY_ID = PCPL.POLICY_ID AND CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PCPL.POLICY_VERSION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CCL ON CCI.CUSTOMER_ID = CCL.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE CCI.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND CCI.CUSTOMER_ID = @CUSTID AND PCPL.POLICY_ID = @POLICY_ID AND CCI.POLICY_ID NOT IN (0) AND CCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID NOT IN (0) AND ISNULL(PCPL.POLICY_NUMBER,'') NOT IN ('')

ClaimPartiesDocMerge.SQL: SELECT CAST(PARTY_ID AS VARCHAR) AS PARTY_ID ,ISNULL([NAME],'') AS [NAME],ISNULL(ADDRESS1,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDRESS2,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CITY,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ZIP,'') AS ADDRESS FROM CLM_PARTIES WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CLAIM_ID= @CLAIM_ID

PRIOR_BI_CSL_LIMIT.SQL: SELECT LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID,LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE,LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE LOOKUP_ID=1350 AND IS_ACTIVE='Y'

QuickApp.SQL: SELECT CUSTOMER_ID, ISNULL(CUSTOMER_CODE,'') AS CUSTOMER_CODE, ISNULL(CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME,'') AS CUSTOMER_NAME, UPPER(ISNULL(IS_ACTIVE,'N')) AS IS_ACTIVE FROM CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CUSTOMER_ID != -1 AND UPPER(ISNULL(IS_ACTIVE,'N')) = 'Y'

EditViewRating.SQL: SELECT RATING_LOG_ID,RATING_ID,AGENCY_ID,LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC,RATED,EFFECTIVE_YEAR,MRLL.IS_ACTIVE, CREATED_BY,CREATED_DATETIME,MODIFIED_BY,MRLL.LAST_UPDATED_DATETIME FROM MNT_RATING_LIST_LOG MRLL Left join MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV on MRLL.AGENCY_ID=MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_ID=1447 and MRLL.RATING_ID IN ( SELECT RATING_ID from MNT_CURRENT_RATING_LIST WHERE COMPANY_ID=@COMPANY_ID )

AccumulationReference.SQL: SELECT AccRef.ACC_ID, AccRef.ACC_REF_NO, LobMaster.LOB_DESC, AccCriteria.CRITERIA_DESC, AccRef.TREATY_CAPACITY_LIMIT FROM mnt_accumulation_reference AccRef, MNT_ACCUMULATION_CRITERIA_MASTER AccCriteria, MNT_LOB_MASTER LobMaster WHERE AccRef.CRITERIA_ID=AccCriteria.CRITERIA_ID and AccRef.LOB_ID=LobMaster.LOB_ID
